title: Lancashire hot pot
description: The Hairy Bikers’ slow-cooked classic Lancashire hot pot is perfect for a hearty, family meal.
ingredients: 1kg/2lb 2oz neck of lamb, chopped into bite-sized pieces
4 lambs' kidneys, cleaned, trimmed, cut into quarters
50g/2oz butter, cut into cubes, plus extra for greasing
2 x 250g/7oz black pudding rings, outer casing removed, thickly sliced
salt and freshly ground black pepper
